publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6283 Adam Ingram: The Protection of Vulnerable Groups (Scotland) Act 2007 (Removal of Barred Individuals from Regulated Work) Regulations 2010â€”That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the Protection of Vulnerable Groups (Scotland) Act 2007 (Removal of Barred Individuals from Regulated Work) Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell*
